Hi HubSpot Dev Community. I am facing problems here with emails.
1. On "Email" drag-and-drop editor, as you can see (screenshot 1), all sections has the bgcolor of gray, and white for its container. But when I sent a test email on desktop browser, it doesn't follow the correct styling (screenshot 2). The lower sections, down to the footer, has now a white background instead of gray.
2. And on mobile (screenshot 3), it doesn't also follow the correct layout. The containers must be 100% in width.
Hope you can help me out! Thanks!

Hi <@U7SL518D6>. Apologies for the late response. I have already resolved this issue. This email was built for a monthly subscription email. And it only filters the posts published for the current month. With that, my client confirmed that they only published 1 post this January.
Thanks for reaching out, by the way! :slightly_smiling_face:
Awesome, thank you for following up, glad to hear you were able to figure it out!

Hi <@UJAPS2K4N>, it's not currently possible but I'd love it to be!

Hopefully HubSpot are working on a way to allow layout templates and use it to extend a base template so all styles can be edited in one place.
